page.title: 17PONY CLUBS
page.content: IF YOU OWN A PONY THERE ARE LOTS OF THINGS THAT YOU CAN DO.YOU CAN JOIN A CLUB AND GO TO CAMP AND YOU WILL ALSO MAKE LOTS OF FRIENDS. AS WELL AS THIS THERE IS RIDING CLUB WHICH IS ON ALTERNATE WEDNESDAYS.ALSO, ON THE LAST FRIDAY OF EVERY MONTH THERE IS A COMPETITION NIGHT WHEN THERE IS TIMED CLEAR-ROUND JUMPING. THE FASTEST THREE RECEIVE ROSETTES. PONY CLUB TAKES PLACE IN THE HOLIDAYS AND WHEN YOU GO YOU ARE DIVIDED INTO GROUPS TO TAKE PART IN A LESSON.YOU ALSO DO SOME JUMPING. AT PONY CLUB CAMP YOU CAMP IN MARQUEES AND STAY FOR 5 DAYS.ALL THE PONIES ARE LET OUT INTO A BIG FIELD. AS WELL AS CLUBS YOU CAN JUST GO FOR RIDES ALONG BEACHES AND ON THE MOORS.
